fields.name: Capacity
fields.description: the number of instances that can be used during this profile.

fields.name: FixedDate
fields.description: the specific date-time for the profile. This element is not used if the Recurrence element is used.

fields.name: Recurrence
fields.description: the repeating times at which this profile begins. This element is not used if the FixedDate element is used.

fields.name: Rules
fields.description: the collection of rules that provide the triggers and parameters for the scaling action. A maximum of 10 rules can be specified.
